long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Image Hover Popup extension is a powerful tool that enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to view images in a convenient and efficient manner. With this plugin, you can effortlessly preview images in a pop-up window simply by hovering over them.

Gone are the days of individually opening each image to get a closer look. Now, with the Image Hover Popup plugin, you can easily navigate through image galleries, photo albums, or any web page containing images, without the need for extra clicks.
